name: OS Town Plan Manchester 1:500 (1889-90, 153 sheets)
description: Large scale Ordnance Survey town plan of Manchester and Salford at 1:500. Surveyed 1888-90, published 1890-96. 153 digitised sheets.
notes:
NLS CC-BY. 153 digitised sheets at 1:500 (extremely detailed).
Not available as pre-built XYZ tiles on S3 (unlike London).

To get Cesium-ready:
1. Open individual sheet from https://maps.nls.uk/os/townplans-england/manchester.html
2. Click Georeference to open AllMaps Editor
3. Place 4+ control points
4. Tiles served at: https://allmaps.xyz/images/{hash}/{z}/{x}/{y}.png
5. Load that XYZ URL as Cesium imagery layer

IIIF pattern: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/{first5}%2F{viewId}/info.json
